name: Jet Link Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: Jet Link Aviation (Pty) Ltd is a reputable flying school dedicated to providing high-quality flight training. Located in a strategic aviation hub, we offer a comprehensive range of programs including Commercial Pilot License (CPL), Instrument Rating (IR), and other specialized certifications. Our fleet of modern, well-maintained aircraft, such as the Diamond DA40 and DA42, ensures students receive hands-on training in state-of-the-art technology. With a supportive and multicultural environment, our experienced instructors are committed to delivering personalized service and innovative teaching methods. We prioritize safety, performance, and student success, making us an ideal choice for aspiring pilots seeking a bright career in aviation. At Jet Link Aviation, we are committed to helping you achieve your flying goals.
services: ["PRIVATE PILOT LICENSE\nCOMMERCIAL PILOT LICENSE\nAIRLINE TRANSPORT PILOT LICENSE"]
